summary: The diff implements the requested fast-fail startup behavior via centralized timing constants, per-step timeouts for actor creation and startup profile loading, and an early background health check to distinguish reachable-but-slow backends. No clear required items appear unimplemented based on the provided diff summary, though some unrelated metadata/summary content was also changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated UI/feature changes described (e.g., LoginPage opaque backgrounds/logo mode, Dashboard admin-only actions, ResidentProfile print toggles, dialog solid white backgrounds, global CSS print/layout overrides, date utils changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not requested by the BuildRequest (which is exclusively about startup/timeout/health-check logic). The only concrete evidence is that these unrelated changes are asserted inside a modified summary file rather than shown as actual code diffs.
